com.csis.reminder.dao

Class NotificationDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.csis.reminder.dao.NotificationDAO
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class NotificationDAO
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Author:
    Reminder Group Class is responsible for managing the notification Data Access Object it contains the methods which allows users to perform CRUD operations on their notifications
    See Also:
